abstract: Switzerland's Federal Office of Justice reports delivery of bank documents related to FIFA corruption scandal to American criminal investigators.
lead_paragraph: The Swiss authorities said the documents would be used in a criminal investigation against soccer officials suspected of bribery. American investigators are also seeking records related to a sports marketing agency.

headline.main: Switzerland Gives Bank Records to U.S. to Aid FIFA Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Switzerland Gives Bank Records to U.S. to Aid FIFA Inquiry

snippet: The Swiss authorities said the documents would be used in a criminal investigation against soccer officials suspected of bribery. American investigators are also seeking records related to a sports marketing agency.
